song.title: Bilou's Adventure : Castle Disco
song.info:
Lost and… found, the Castle Zone of Bilou’s Adventure was dropped as to close to the castles of Super Mario Bros 3 and the similar world of Fury of the Furries. Anyway, the music i’ve written for that was realy fun, mix of Dance and Disco with a church organ melody. That music would be great an halloween bonus stage ! At that time PPP Team promoted those available games : Pengo’s Adventure, the two first episodes of Badman, Xeen Commander and the forcoming Bilou’s Tris.
project : Bilou's Adventure, P.P.P. Team Software game project download : http://sylvainhb.blogspot.com/
